channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S., UK aim to usher in "golden age of nuclear" in series of deals
item.description: The U.S. and United Kingdom on Sunday announced a wide-ranging series of nuclear power deals in which multiple leading U.S. nuclear companies will bui...

item.title: Romania becomes 2nd NATO nation in a week to report Russian drone in its airspace
item.description: Romania summoned Russia's ambassador to Bucharest Sunday after it became the second NATO country in less than a week to report a Russian drone incursi...

item.title: Trump on TikTok ban deadline: "We may let it die"
item.description: President Trump indicated Sunday he could again extend this week's deadline for TikTok to be sold or banned. What he's saying: "I may or may not, we'r...

item.title: N.Y. Gov. Kathy Hochul endorses Zohran Mamdani for NYC mayor
item.description: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul (D) endorsed Democratic nominee Zohran Mamdani for mayor of New York City on Sunday. Why it matters: Hochul's endorsement o...

item.title: Kirk shooting suspect had ‘leftist ideology’ but motive unclear, Utah official says
item.description: Utah Gov. Spencer Cox said authorities are speaking with suspect Tyler Robinson’s family and romantic partner as they investigate Charlie Kirk’s killi...

item.title: Hochul, Van Hollen back Zohran Mamdani as senator slams ‘spineless’ Democrats
item.description: Sen. Chris Van Hollen of Maryland says Democratic leaders need to line up behind Zohran Mamdani’s New York mayoral bid if the party wants to win elect...

item.title: Trump says foreign experts welcome after South Korean outrage over raid
item.description: President Trump on Sunday said the U.S. welcomes foreign experts to train Americans how to build high-tech goods, days after hundreds of arrested Sout...

item.title: Trump’s unpredictable Guard deployments send big-city mayors scrambling
item.description: Democratic mayors are laboring to stay prepared and unified as Trump weighs federal incursions that could upend their communities and political career...

item.title: Republican Rep. Michael McCaul of Texas will not seek reelection
item.description: The longtime lawmaker, who has at times disagreed with Trump on foreign policy, has been a supporter of Ukraine in its war against Russia.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s killing and its aftermath are symptoms of a fragile democracy
item.description: Rising politically motivated violence is an “attack on the American experiment,” cautioned Utah Gov. Spencer Cox.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
